mapper.insert: insert into tbl_commment(bo_seq, cmt_content, cmt_date, user_id) values(#{bo_seq),#{cmt_content},SYSDATE,#{user_id})
mapper.update: update tbl_comment set cmt_content=#{cmt_content} where cmt_seq=#{cmt_seq} and bo_seq={bo_seq}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_comment where cmt_seq=#{cmt_seq} and bo_seq={bo_seq}
mapper.select: select tbl_comment.cmt_content, tbl_comment.cmt_date, tbl_comment.cmt_likes,tbl_user.user_nick from (select * from tbl_comment inner join tbl_user on tbl_comment.user_id = tbl_user.user_id where bl_comment.bo_seq=#{bo_seq} order by DESC) where (ROWNUM between (1 - #{page})+1 and #{page}*10)
select * from (select * from tbl_review where prod_code=#{prod_code} order by DESC) where (ROWNUM between (1 - #{page})+1 and #{page}*10)
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(prod_code, user_id, review_content, review_img1, review_img2, review_date) values(#{prod_code},#{user_id},#{review_content},#{review_img1},#{review_img2},SYSDATE)
